alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 3:23PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Holmes and north central Washington Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 223 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles west of Bonifay, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bonifay, Chipley, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Esto, Westville, Noma, Cerrogordo, Tendil Crossing, Gritney, Holland Crossroads, Smith Crossroads, Hickory Hill, Izagora, New Hope, Noma Junction, Miller Crossroads, Holmes County Airport, Barker Store and Bethlehem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
